section.title: Layout
section.para: Layout provides a very flexible way of customizing the appearance of forms. Clipped on a Majisti Form, a Layout object will redesign how a form's elements are positionned. A concrete layout class needs to implement the ILayout interface, defining the functions visitForm and visitElement. The visitForm function customizes the appearance of every form elements and receives a Zend_Form to visit, as opposed to visitElement whom customizes a single form element, thus receiving a Zend_Form_Element.
